Row.Text: While established in a foreign city, all units producing in that city come under your control.

Replace.Text: +25% [ICON_Production] Production to all military units in the city.
All friendly units fighting within the city's territory gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

When established in a foreign [ICON_Capital] Capital, [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances from the city owner against you are reduced by 1 more per turn. Your Alliance Points with the owner increase an extra .5 per turn.
